name: spiral shell facial scrubbie
sizes_available: 1 size for a 3.75" diameter base scrubbie
notes:
**spiral shell facial scrubbie**

this little stash buster is ready for the beach and is perfect for adding handmade and reusable sustainability to your self care routine. they also make great gifts with your favorite beachy-themed soap or salt scrub.

the pattern requires basic knowledge of crochet and crochet stitches including chaining, working in a magic ring, half double crochet, double crochet, increasing, and working in the back and front loop.

this pattern is perfect for an adventurous beginner looking to test your skills by working in a spiral and through front and back loops only.

find the pattern on my website here: [https://homespunhues.com/pattern/shell-facial-scrubbie/][1]

**finished measurements**

finished scrubbie measures approximately 4.5” in diameter using a 5.0mm crochet hook and size 4, worsted weight yarn.

**materials**

25yds / 23m (14g) of a durable, size 4, worsted weight cotton yarn - i use loops & threads everyday cotton or lily sugar’n cream
5.0mm crochet hook
scissors
tapestry needle
stitch marker

**pattern notes**

pattern is written in american standard terms.

do not join between rounds, scrubbie is worked in a spiral.

you may sell small batch, handmade items using this pattern including a link with credit in your product description. you may not redistribute or resell this pattern without written consent from the author. contact me for pattern licensing information.

because this is a digital file and will be available instantly for download, any refund or cancellation requests are unavailable.

**for more information**

visit the pattern on my website at: [https://homespunhues.com/pattern/shell-facial-scrubbie/][2]

**recommended use**

use finger loop to secure scrubbie to your hand during use. lather with your favorite soap for an exfoliating wash. follow yarn manufacturer’s instructions for washing.
